dict.acceptation: 拨款；补助金；授给物（如财产、授地、专有权、补助、拨款等）；

sent.orig: Last Wednesday,Mrs. Fernandez went to Mr. Grant's office during her lunch break.
sent.trans: 上个星期三，Fernandez夫人在中午休息时到Grant先生的办公室去了一趟。

sent.orig: Mr.Grant, he promised to turn on the heat, but he never did.
sent.trans: 也就是Grant先生，他都允诺把暖气打开，但他根本就没去做。

sent.orig: The man promised to call Mr.Grant and tell him to fix it.
sent.trans: 这名工作人员许诺他会给Grant 先生打电话，让他把暖气修好。

sent.orig: That summer, Grant painted Keynes writing his prophetic book, The Economic Consequences of the Peace.
sent.trans: 那个夏天，Grant画下了正在写书的凯恩斯，那是一本预言式的书-《和平的经济后果》。

sent.orig: Uh, uh, it's 888 Grant Avenue. It's a block east of Washington Square.
sent.trans: 嗯，哦，是Grant大道888号。华盛顿广场东边的一个街区。
